com.twitter.heron.instance

Class Gateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.instance.Gateway
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Gateway
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Gateway is a Runnable and will be executed in a thread. It will new the streamManagerClient and metricsManagerClient in constructor and ask them to connect with corresponding socket endpoint in run().
